channel.title: knyL
channel.description: I work creating software that solve problems in a simple way, and this place use to share what I learn along the way. The blog will focus on .NET Core and other related technologies. I hope you will gain some knowledge here on knyl.me. See y'all around!

item.title: CI/CD for My Own Projects: Ain't nobody got time for manual deployment, amirite?
item.description: As a dev, I usually don't like to deploy my own projects 'cause the whole process takes a lot of time and there's always the risk of messing things up. But ever since I switched to GitHub Actions CI/CD, I've been able to save time, cut down on errors, and concentrate on the real deal - developing my projects.

item.title: Install TimescaleDB on an existing PostgreSQL container
item.description: I researched TimescaleDB, a powerful database for time-series data. While installing it on an existing container, I encountered a challenge. After experimenting with different methods and configurations, I successfully installed TimescaleDB.

item.title: Set up Wildcard SSL for Godaddy domain with Let's Encrypt
item.description: Using Certbot to set up SSL for Godaddy domain

item.title: The Very First Post
item.description: A new beginning for knyL's blog.
